name: Garbage Concern Welfare Society
briefDescription: GARBAGE CONCERN WELFARE SOCIETY is research and environment education promoting organization working since 2005. Our mission is to bridge the gap in health, sanitation and livelihood opportunities faced by urban poor through environmental skill training that assures employment. We focus on environmental trainings, linking environment and livelihood to urban poor, and various CSR projects related to environment. we have more than 3000 volunteers joined with our work.
